decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (85.PL200, 85.PL201, 85.PL202, design and access statement, 85.PL102 A received on 21/04/2015 and 85.PL100 A and 85.PL101 A received 23/06/2015 and surface water management plan received on 13/07/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - All soft landscape works shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details.  The works shall be carried out upon completion of the development or in accordance with a programme agreed with the local planning authority.
description: Erection of an outdoor play structure in the form of an adobe dome and amphitheatre.
